short_summary: computer flight planning services for national defense
description: computer flight planning service providing ability for aircrew to obtain route, fuel requirements, time
full_summary:
**Computer Flight Planning Services (CFPS)**
======================================

**Notice**: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

**Publication Date**: April 20, 2023

**Closing Date**: May 5, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST

**Estimated Contract Value**: Subject to negotiation

**Description**: The Department of National Defence (DND) 1 Canadian Air Division (1 CAD) located in Winnipeg, Manitoba, requires a Computer Flight Planning Service (CFPS). This service must provide the ability for aircrew to obtain a route, fuel requirements, time, distance from a departing aerodrome to the arrival aerodrome in an electronic format.

**Key Requirements**:

* The service must be compatible with the current planning services utilized by other areas of DND.
* The contractor must comply with all Mandatory Requirements identified herein.
* The period of the contract will be from the award date to March 31, 2024, with five (5) one-year option periods.

**Reply Instructions**: To bid on this project, suppliers must submit a statement of capability by the closing date. An Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) is a public notice indicating the department's intention to award a contract to a pre-identified supplier. Other suppliers can signal their interest in bidding by submitting a statement of capabilities. Suppliers that meet the requirements set out in the ACAN by the closing date may be selected for award.

**Important**: The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contracting Officer**: Zumbado Diaz, Willy (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsg
